topic.title: New installation
topic.shortdesc: How to install the plugin fusinvsnmp

body.p: To install it, you must do :

li.p: Uncompress the file into the plugin folder of GLPI. File list seems to be like :

ul.li: Go into the menu Configuration > Plugins

body.p: These operations will create tables in database MySQL and rights on the plugin.
body.note: Link for install / activate this plugin is hidden if plugin isn't installed and activated.
